@graph.rdfs:label: Automatic construction of PubLayNet document layout annotation dataset by PDF-XML alignment on PubMed Central Open Access subset
PubMed Central Open Access XML articles (NLM-JATS schema, 1,162,856 complete articles downloaded 2018-10-03)
Corresponding PDF versions of 1,162,856 PMCOA articles
PubLayNet document layout dataset (335k+ pages annotated with Text, Title, List, Table, Figure categories; train/val/test splits with manual curation of val/test)
PDFMiner (Python) used for low-level PDF layout parsing (textboxes, textlines, images, geometric shapes)
fuzzysearch Python package (Levenshtein-distance fuzzy string matching) for robust PDF-text to XML-text alignment

Custom Python annotation pipeline (XML preprocessing, node grouping, adaptive-threshold fuzzy matching, margin-based figure/table body detection, polygon segmentation generation, quality-control filtering â‰¥99% coverage)
